Posts.EditableText: OK, do you people prefer to play a game that puts you as the main character? Or a game where you control a character?
Posts.HTML: OK, do you people prefer to play a game that puts you as the main character? Or a game where you control a character?

Posts.EditableText: do you mean as in you make your own character, or play a set one?
Posts.HTML: do you mean as in you make your own character, or play a set one?

Posts.EditableText:
I mean play as a set character or play as yourself. So for instance a game that went:
You wake up in a daze
or
Dave woke up in a daze
Posts.HTML:
I mean play as a set character or play as yourself. So for instance a game that went:
You wake up in a daze
or
Dave woke up in a daze

Posts.EditableText: most games are coded to say 'you' even if it a different character, because you're playing it so effectively it *is* you.
Posts.HTML: most games are coded to say 'you' even if it a different character, because you're playing it so effectively it *is* you.

Posts.EditableText: ok thats what i thought would be best. Cheers

Posts.EditableText: You mean 1st person or third person.  It really depends what sort of game I'm playing.  If it's a shooter, I'd go for 1st person.  If it's an RPG, 1st person too.  It all depends what type of game
Posts.HTML: You mean 1st person or third person.  It really depends what sort of game I'm playing.  If it's a shooter, I'd go for 1st person.  If it's an RPG, 1st person too.  It all depends what type of game
